headline: Digimarc and Zebra Technologies Team Up to Dramatically Reduce Gift Card Fraud and Improve the Shopping Experience
summary: BEAVERTON, Ore. & LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., December 04, 2025--Digimarc Corporation (NASDAQ: DMRC), a leading provider of digital identity and authentication technologies, is working with Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a leading global provider of connected frontline, asset visibility and automation solutions powered by AI, to help retailers and brands fight gift card fraud.

headline: Zebra Technologies (ZBRA): Valuation Check After Strong Q3 Beat, Raised Outlook, and Surprising Share Price Weakness
summary: Zebra Technologies (ZBRA) just turned in a strong third quarter, lifting revenue guidance and topping earnings forecasts, yet the stock is roughly 19% lower since the report, leaving investors puzzling over the disconnect. See our latest analysis for Zebra Technologies. Zooming out, Zebra’s 90 day share price return of minus 17.4 percent and year to date slide of 32.4 percent show momentum fading even as three year total shareholder return remains slightly positive. This suggests investors...
